Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2015 07:22AM newinab wrote: Hi Candy1959 Welcome. In Nov 2014 I too was diagnosed with IDC grade 1. I had my surgery on Dec 11 2014. Surgery went well no cancer in my lymph nodes or outside margins. I am now back to work part-time. If you have any questions feel free to ask.
Posts.Title: Anyone with Grade 1 tumors - what was your node status? shelleym1 newinab
